routes.title: Ring of Resilience
routes.description: Challenge yourself on the Ring of Resilience, a circular route around Yishun Ring Road that tests your endurance and determination. It’s more than just a run—it’s a journey to discover your inner strength. Lace up, hit the ring, and let your resilience shine!
routes.author: Wei Shen

commentsList.name: Tom
commentsList.text: Loved the scenic views! @Zhong Yan, I challenge you to run 100 rounds around it!

commentsList.name: Zhong Yan
commentsList.text: This is so amazing! Thank you for this fun challenge @Tom, I'm gonna run 100 rounds around it tomorrow!

routes.title: Dino Dash: Punggol Edition
routes.description: Tackle the Dino Dash: Punggol Edition, a unique route shaped like a dinosaur. Trace the curves of this prehistoric path and let its playful design fuel your run. Lace up and conquer this one-of-a-kind trail!
routes.author: Wei Shen

routes.title: Marina Bay Loop
routes.description: Run around the iconic Marina Bay area, where the skyline meets the sea. This loop offers scenic views and is perfect for both tourists and locals looking to experience the beauty of Singapore.
routes.author: Wei Shen

routes.title: Botanic Gardens Trail
routes.description: Escape the city and run through the lush greenery of the Botanic Gardens. The perfect route for nature lovers seeking peace and quiet.
routes.author: Maria Lee

routes.title: East Coast Park Stretch
routes.description: Run alongside the beach with the sound of the waves as your companion. The East Coast Park stretch is perfect for long-distance runners and offers beautiful coastal views.
routes.author: Maria Lee

commentsList.name: Daniel
commentsList.text: A bit long, but the view is worth it!

routes.title: Mount Faber Challenge
routes.description: Conquer the Mount Faber ascent, a challenging uphill run that rewards you with breathtaking views of the city at the top.
routes.author: David Lim

routes.title: Sentosa Island Loop
routes.description: Enjoy a scenic run around the beautiful Sentosa Island. This loop offers both adventure and relaxation with the perfect blend of nature and resorts.
routes.author: Megan Tan

commentsList.name: Leo
commentsList.text: A fun run through the island!

routes.title: Punggol Waterway
routes.description: Run along the scenic Punggol Waterway, where nature and urban life coexist in harmony. A great spot for families and leisure runners.
routes.author: Jason Wong

routes.title: Jurong Lake Gardens Jog
routes.description: Jog through the tranquil Jurong Lake Gardens, where lush greenery and the calm waters of the lake offer a peaceful running experience.
routes.author: Sophia Goh

routes.title: Coney Island Expedition
routes.description: Venture out to Coney Island and explore its wild, untamed nature. This route is perfect for runners seeking a bit of adventure off the beaten path.
routes.author: Henry Chua

routes.title: City Skylines
routes.description: Take on the City Skylines route for an invigorating journey through the heart of the metropolis. This 12km course winds through bustling city streets, quiet parks, and waterfront promenades, offering spectacular views of the skyline. With every stride, you’ll encounter iconic skyscrapers, vibrant city life, and the peacefulness of nature in city parks. Perfect for runners who love the urban landscape, this route is best enjoyed during early mornings when the sun casts a golden hue on the buildings. Don’t forget to pause at some of the observation spots to capture breathtaking photos of the skyline!
routes.author: Bean

commentsList.name: Kelly
commentsList.text: Perfect route for a morning run.

routes.title: Riverfront Run
routes.description: Experience tranquility on the Riverfront Run, a 10km route along the scenic riverside. This path is designed for runners seeking a refreshing escape from the busy city. You’ll pass under graceful bridges, alongside tranquil water features, and through lush riverside parks filled with flowers and greenery. Perfect for an evening jog, the gentle breeze from the river cools you down, making it a refreshing and serene running experience. Evening runners are rewarded with beautiful reflections of the sunset on the river surface, creating a truly magical atmosphere. This route is ideal for those who enjoy a peaceful yet invigorating run.
routes.author: Bean

routes.title: Sunset Boulevard
routes.description: The Sunset Boulevard run offers an 8km stretch perfect for those who appreciate a peaceful and scenic route as the day winds down. This course follows a quiet boulevard lined with trees, park benches, and gentle hills. Starting at the beach entrance, runners are treated to panoramic views of the setting sun over the horizon. This is a place where time seems to slow, allowing you to savor the golden hour as the sky changes colors. Great for both solo runners and groups, this route also provides multiple spots to stop and take in the breathtaking sunset views. Run this route at the end of the day for a perfect combination of fitness and relaxation!
routes.author: Bean

commentsList.name: Mark
commentsList.text: A great end to a long day.

routes.title: The Lakeside Stroll
routes.description: Take a peaceful journey along The Lakeside Stroll, a 5km path that hugs the city’s largest lake. This route winds around the waterfront, passing through areas rich with local flora and fauna. Frequent benches, open picnic spots, and quaint parks offer opportunities to rest and enjoy the surroundings. Gentle breezes and the sound of rippling water make it perfect for a morning jog or an evening walk. Runners can enjoy unobstructed views of the water, reflecting the changing sky, and watch for ducks and other wildlife that call this area home.
routes.author: Anna Kim

commentsList.name: Mia
commentsList.text: Loved the quiet spots along the way!

routes.title: Urban Jungle Adventure
routes.description: The Urban Jungle Adventure offers a thrilling 6km journey through the heart of the city’s greenery. This route meanders through hidden city parks, botanical gardens, and nature trails nestled between towering skyscrapers. Every twist and turn brings a new sight, from urban art installations to small waterfalls and ponds. Designed for nature enthusiasts and city lovers alike, this route is a beautiful escape that still feels deeply connected to the urban landscape. Start early to experience the mist rising from the gardens, adding a mystical vibe to your run.
routes.author: Anna Kim

routes.title: Mountain Edge Trail
routes.description: Mountain Edge Trail is an 8km journey along rocky paths with stunning cliffside views. Ideal for adventurers, this trail has its challenges—steep climbs, rugged paths, and sharp turns—but the reward is worth it. At every peak, you’ll find panoramic vistas of the valley below and the forest canopy stretching to the horizon. The trail includes several resting areas where you can pause, take photos, and soak in the views. Start early to catch the sunrise illuminating the valley, transforming the trail into a breathtaking experience.
routes.author: Ben Chang

routes.title: Forest of Ferns
routes.description: The Forest of Ferns is a 4km trail set within a lush, secluded forest reserve, designed for runners looking to escape into nature. As you run through this trail, you’ll be surrounded by a variety of ferns, tall trees, and wildflowers. The quiet serenity of the forest is occasionally punctuated by the sound of rustling leaves and birdsong, making this a tranquil, immersive experience. Enjoy the fresh forest air and the scenic natural beauty that make this trail a peaceful retreat.
routes.author: Cathy Lim

routes.title: Seaside Promenade
routes.description: Breathe in the fresh ocean air on the Seaside Promenade, a beautiful 7km route along the coast. This path offers panoramic ocean views, sandy beaches, and the soothing sound of waves. Popular for sunset jogs, the route also has plenty of benches and scenic lookouts where you can relax and enjoy the ocean breeze. Joggers can expect an array of sights, from fishermen casting their lines to seagulls diving over the water. For runners who enjoy the sea, this is an ideal trail to unwind and reconnect with nature.
routes.author: Cathy Lim

routes.title: Historic Heartbeat
routes.description: Historic Heartbeat offers a 5km journey through the city’s oldest neighborhoods, where each building and monument tells a story. The route takes runners past ancient temples, heritage buildings, and iconic landmarks. With informational plaques along the way, you’ll learn about the city’s history as you run. This route is ideal for history enthusiasts who want to combine sightseeing with exercise, offering a memorable, culturally rich experience.
routes.author: David Yeo

routes.title: Blossom Boulevard
routes.description: Blossom Boulevard is a vibrant 3km route filled with seasonal flowers and trees in full bloom. This short but scenic route takes you through a series of flower beds, green lawns, and garden paths. Each season brings a new wave of colors and fragrances, from cherry blossoms in the spring to vivid autumn leaves. It’s perfect for a relaxed run or a walk, ideal for flower enthusiasts and anyone looking to immerse themselves in nature’s beauty.
routes.author: Eva Tan

routes.title: The Serene Loop
routes.description: Nestled within Greenfield Park, The Serene Loop is a 4km path ideal for a peaceful run or a leisurely stroll. Surrounded by trees, small lakes, and shaded pathways, this route provides a calming escape from the city’s hustle. Runners can expect occasional sightings of swans and ducks in the ponds, adding to the serene atmosphere. This is a perfect choice for those who seek tranquility and a gentle pace within the natural beauty of a park setting.
routes.author: Eva Tan

routes.title: Peak Performance
routes.description: For a challenging yet rewarding workout, Peak Performance is a 9km trail that climbs steadily to the top of a scenic hill. As you ascend, the landscape opens up, revealing sweeping views of the valley and forests below. The path is a mix of gravel and stone, adding to the difficulty, but the views from the top are breathtaking. Perfect for runners looking to build endurance, this route will test your stamina and reward you with a sense of achievement upon reaching the summit.
routes.author: Grace Wong

routes.title: Coastal Breeze Path
routes.description: Coastal Breeze Path is a scenic 8km run along the coastline, perfect for beach lovers. This route takes you past sandy shores, bustling beach cafes, and surf shops. The fresh ocean breeze and sound of crashing waves make this a delightful experience. Runners can expect gentle slopes, boardwalks, and opportunities to dip their feet in the water at various points. It's best enjoyed at sunset, with golden hues lighting up the path and casting reflections across the water.
routes.author: Harry Lee

routes.title: Sunrise Trail
routes.description: Sunrise Trail is a picturesque 5km route with the perfect view of the sunrise over the valley. For early risers, this trail offers a unique experience as the sun gradually lights up the surrounding landscape, painting the sky with warm hues. Enjoy the fresh morning air and the calm surroundings as you run through a path flanked by wildflowers and the scent of morning dew.
routes.author: Harry Lee

routes.title: Rolling Hills Circuit
routes.description: Rolling Hills Circuit is a 7km route that takes runners through gentle slopes and pastoral landscapes. This is an excellent route for runners looking for a little bit of elevation mixed with scenic countryside views. The trail features rolling hills that provide a moderate workout, complemented by open fields and occasional herds of grazing animals.
routes.author: Ivy Koh

commentsList.name: Jackie
commentsList.text: A nice mix of hills and flat areas.

routes.title: Valley View Path
routes.description: Valley View Path is a 6km scenic route with multiple observation points. Perfect for photographers and nature lovers, this trail offers panoramic views of the valley and the nearby hills. Ideal for evening jogs as the light fades, this route brings a peaceful, reflective experience.
routes.author: Jackie Lau
